changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.product ( id bigserial NOT NULL, name character varying NOT NULL, description character varying, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, pinned boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false, CONSTRAINT product_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT product_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_name_key UNIQUE (name ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
